title: Singer CeeLo Green reveals he's been engaged for 1 year
text:
Photo: Casey Curry, Casey Curry/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 3   3 CeeLo Green poses for a portrait on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) CeeLo Green poses for a portrait on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) CeeLo Green poses for a portrait on Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Los Angeles. (Photo by Casey Curry/Invision/AP) Photo: Casey Curry, Casey Curry/Invision/AP Singer CeeLo Green reveals he's been engaged for 1 year 1  /  3 Back to Gallery NEW YORK (AP) â€” Recording a new album isn't the only thing CeeLo Green has done in the last year: The singer revealed that he also proposed to his longtime girlfriend.
Green, 41, told People magazine that he's been engaged to Shani James , 38, for about a year. A representative for the Grammy winner confirmed the engagement on Friday.
Green will release a new album, "Heart Blanche," on Nov. 6.
The former "Voice" coach said he and James didn't want to promote their engagement.
"We're a collective power together because our private life is sacred. But you know ... maybe it is time for the world to know that I have a very secure situation and a loving woman supporting me the entire way," he said.
Green was previously married to Christina Johnson .
